author: Staff Reporter
text:
Stating that her daughter, a Standard VIII student of Adi Dravidar Middle School in Chikanampatty village in Omalur Taluk, suffered fracture in leg after falling in school while cleaning the fan, her mother sought action against the headmistress here on Monday.

In her petition to the Inspector of Police, Omalur station, Pappa said that on March 4, the headmistress asked her to clean the ceiling fan. She climbed up the table and was cleaning the fan when she fell down. She suffered fracture in her leg and was admitted to Government Hospital in Omalur.

Hence, she demanded action against the headmistress for making her daughter clean the fan that led to the incident.
title: Woman demands action against headmistress
